values: 国家；政府；州；邦；状况；状态；情形；情况；领土；地位；身份；正式场合；正式礼仪；隆重仪式；美国（the States）；印记；图章；印图；压印
国家的；政府的；州的；邦的；官方的；正式的；隆重的；用于正式场合的
声明；陈述；说明；表达；阐明；提出；公布；规定；详细说明；公开表明

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 规定（state的过去分词）；陈述；阐明
没有国家的；无国家主权的
声明；陈述，叙述；报表，清单
治国才能；管理国家的本领

word_mean_info__list.difference: 常用于文学中，侧重国土，带感情色彩。
正式用词，指政治概念上的国家，即由政府所代表的国家。
特指拥有强大军事力量，在国际事务中有较强权威或影响的国家，即强国、大国。
普通用词，指在某一国土定居的人民、民族，强调人民。
普通用词，侧重国土与人民。
较正式用词，通常指用明确的语言或文字着重地叙述事实，既强调内容又注重语气。
侧重于说话动作的本身，着重说话的能力而不在内容，可以是长篇大论的演讲，也可以是三言两语的交谈，甚至指简单的开口发声说话。
最普通常用词，指用语言表达思想，着重所说的内容。
普通用词，指把某事告诉或讲述给某人听，口语或书面语均可用。
着重说话的行为，常指声音的使用，突出用噪子发声。
普通用词，侧重指与人交谈时的连续说话，可指单方面较长谈话，和speak一样，着重说活动作而不侧重内容。
多指周围的情况或某事发生时的情况。
指一个人在政治、社会、经济、法律上的地位或身份，暗含地位显要意味。也可用于指政治等事态的状况。
一般强调产生影响的原因或环境，复数形式指笼统的情况。
普通用词，指人或物在环境、外表、心灵以及健康方面的状况，或指在某一阶段的状态或形式。
指明确具体的环境情况或处境。

word_group.brief_definition: 最新发展水平, 最新型的
国家机构；国家署；州机构
国务大臣；国务卿；国务秘书
州测试；国家测试；国家测验
事态, 情况, 形势
进展情况, 发展阶段, 当前情形, 当前状况；比分, 得分
(天主教指灵魂上没有大罪的状态)受天主眷爱, 蒙受恩宠

bilingual.source: The patient is in a critical state.
The machine is in a stable state.
Please check the state of the system.

bilingual.target: 他的情绪状态有所改善。

bilingual.source: The economy is in a state of equilibrium.
The president proclaimed a state of emergency.
The president declares a state of emergency.
bilingual.target: 总统宣布进入紧急状态。

bilingual.source: The project is in a quasi-completed state.
bilingual.target: 项目处于类似的完成状态。

bilingual.source: Technology is in a constant state of flux.
bilingual.target: 技术处于不断的变化状态。

bilingual.source: The dervish danced in a trance-like state.
bilingual.target: 苦行僧在恍惚的状态下跳舞。

list.abstract: state：英语单词，可以用作名词、及物动词和形容词，在用作不同形式时其含义不尽相同。

yingyinNormal.en: The "don't have" state is very easily imaginable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有得到的状态很容易想象。

yingyinNormal.en: We took a group of students in what we called the cold states, state of non-arousal, completely calm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们选了一组学生，他们处于冷淡状态，即性欲未被激发，完全处于平静状态。

yingyinNormal.en: Age is a state of mind, Leonard. In here I'm 90.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，年龄是一种心理状态，我这儿已经90岁了。

yingyinNormal.en: So, the universe will end in much the same state as it began, accelerating.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此宇宙将会以与其产生时相同的状态结束，加速。

yingyinNormal.en: The students in the cold state say that I'll never do this. I'll never do this. I'll never do this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 受访学生在冷淡状态时说我肯定不会这样。

yingyinNormal.en: In the hot state they would much more likely to see themselves behaving this way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 处于被激发状态时，则发现自己更为可能接受这些行为。

yingyinNormal.en: That can be told by the state of his fingernails and the fact that there's hair growing in his ears. So it's a superficial job, then.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从他指甲的状态可以看出来，还有他的耳毛。所以只是表面功夫。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, this is actually a big issue, because you can train people as much as you want in the cold state to want condoms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个很重要的规律，因为你不停地告诫处于冷淡状态的人们他们应该使用安全套。

yingyinNormal.en: We call the accelerating end state of the universe a de Sitter phase, named after the Dutch mathematician Willem de Sitter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们称宇宙的加速最终状态为德西特阶段，这是根据荷兰数学家威廉?德西特命名的。

yingyinNormal.en: Apart from that. Listen, before I do anything, I need to know what state you're in. Well, you're a doctor, examine me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了那个。听着，在我采取行动之前，我得知道你现在什么状态。你是医生，给我做检查吧。

yingyinNormal.en: You're thinking of 28 Days Later. 28 Days is where Sandra Bullock goes to rehab and puts the audience into an undead state.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说的是《惊变28天》，《28天》里面桑德拉·布洛克去戒酒，结果让观众升华到濒死状态。

yingyinNormal.en: We thought my 90-year-old grandfather had reverted to an asexual state, but the lawsuit from his Jamaican caregiver proved us all wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我家以为我们90岁的姥爷也转回了无性状态，直到他的牙买加裔看护员告上法庭，证明了我们都错了。

yingyinNormal.en: For someone like you to steal? Yes. In the dream state, your conscious defenses are lowered and that makes your thoughts vulnerable to theft. It's called extraction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 便于你们偷取？对 睡梦状态意识防卫会减弱，便于我们从中盗取信息，我们就是盗梦者。

yingyinNormal.en: It also faces the television at a direct angle, allowing me to immerse myself in entertainment or game play without being subjected to conversation. As a result, I've placed it in a state of eternal dibs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且正对着电视机，我能专心看电视或者打机，不受谈话干扰。因此，我把它置于永恒状态了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the central valley today. And this, in a rare aerial survey from the 1930s, shows the exact same valley as a barren desert. The valley's natural state.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是今天的中央山谷，而这里是上世纪30年代拍摄的同一地区的航拍图象，看上去，这同样的地方在当时，仍然是荒凉的沙漠，这是山谷原本的状态。

yingyinNormal.en: So that's why we look for planets that have rocky surfaces where water could pool and that are receiving the right amount of energy from the star, where the water wouldn't be locked up in a frozen state because the planet is so cold, nor would it be evaporated away because the planet is too hot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以这就是我们为什么寻找具备这些条件的星球。要有岩石表面可以积水，并获得来自恒星的适量的能量。那里的水不会因为星球太冷而以冰冻的状态封存，也不要因为星球太热，水分都被蒸发掉了。

yingyinNormal.en: They'll never shoot down a head of state.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不会把一国元首打下来的。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you wanna run for State's Attorney?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想竞选州检察官吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What? Would you wanna run for State's Attorney?
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？你想竞选州检察官吗？

yingyinNormal.en: That's not a state Joe. Oh, and Mississ-Pete is?
yingyinNormal.zh: 芝加哥不是州。密西西彼特就是？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.en: an organized political community forming part of a country; a country considered as an organized political community controlled by one government
sense_info_list.zh: 国家; 政府; 州; 邦

examination_example.sentence: Haddad and Lewis are concerned that more than half the <highlight>state</highlight>-government boards are less than 40 percent female.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Haddad和Lewis担心，在超过一半的州政府董事会成员中女性占比不到40%。

examination_example.sentence: But if Congress wanted to prevent <highlight>states</highlight> from using their own resources to check immigration status, it could.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果国会想阻止各州使用自己的资源来检查移民身份，它就一定可以做到。

examination_example.sentence: Arizona had attempted to fashion <highlight>state</highlight> policies that ran parallel to the existing federal ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚利桑那州曾试图制定与现有联邦政策平行的州政策。

examination_example.sentence: The United <highlight>States</highlight> has never had a president or vice-president or secretary of state Joe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国从未有过名字叫乔的总统、副总统或国务卿。

examination_example.sentence: Entergy runs 11 other reactors in the United <highlight>States</highlight>, including Pilgrim Nuclear station in Plymouth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Entergy在美国运营着另外11座反应堆，包括位于普利茅斯的皮尔格林核电站。

examination_example.sentence: The only American public-sector workers who earn well above $250,000 a year are university sports coaches and the president of the United <highlight>States</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国公共部门唯一年收入远高于25万美元的员工是大学体育教练和美国总统。

sense_info_list.zh: 状态; 状况; 形态

examination_example.sentence: Old telescopes will be removed at the end of their lifetimes and their sites returned to a natural <highlight>state</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旧望远镜将在使用寿命结束时被拆除，它们的位置将恢复到自然状态。

examination_example.sentence: The sheer volume of available choice is enough to send shoppers into a <highlight>state</highlight> of information overload.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可供选择的数量之多足以让购物者陷入信息过载的状态。

examination_example.sentence: Composure is a <highlight>state</highlight> of mind made possible by the structuring of one's relation to one's environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沉着是一种通过构建人与环境的关系才有可能存在的心态。

examination_example.sentence: Next time you <highlight>state</highlight> your position, formulate an argument for what you claim and honestly ask yourself whether your argument is any good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下次你陈述你的立场时，为你的主张提出一个论点，并诚实地问自己你的论点是否有任何好处。

examination_example.sentence: You should <highlight>state</highlight> reasons for your recommendation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该说明你推荐的理由。

examination_example.sentence: As so often is the case, <highlight>stating</highlight> that principle doesn't ease the challenge of line-drawing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常情况下，陈述原则并不能缓解画线的挑战。

sense_info_list.en: connected with the leader of a country attending an official ceremony
sense_info_list.zh: 正式的; 国事规格的

sense_info_list.en: the formal ceremonies connected with high levels of government or with kings and queens

word_usage.usage:
表示“表明、宣称、宣布”
declare指公布、宣布、表明、宣称；
state指陈述、说明、声明。
indicate指表明、暗示。
announce指宣布、宣告、（通过广播）通知。

表示“国家”
state侧重指独立政府统治下的政权机构，尤其在英国英语中，该词亦可指政府，在北美英语中，the state通常指美国50个州中的一个州，而非指作为一个整体的国家政府。
country是指国家的最普通的中性词。
nation强调其民族、社会及经济结构。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“声明、陈述”，后面接名词或“that”引起的从句。
意为“宣布、宣告、宣称”，同"state"相近，但主要指口头上的声明，后面接名词或“that”引起的从句。
意为“宣布、宣告”，后面接名词或“that”引导的从句。
意为“断言、声称、声明”，正式用语，后面接名词或"that''引起的从句。
正式用语，意为“断言、肯定”。
意为“国家”，侧重指政权、政体，即政治层面的国家。
意为“国家”，侧重国家的人民。
意为“国家”，侧重指国家的疆土。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 国家提供的; 国家控制的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 州与州之间的；州际的；他州的；别的州的
adj. & adv. 遍布某州的；某州范围的
n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.en: an organized political community forming part of a country; a country considered as an organized political community controlled by one government

examination_example.sentence: He boosted the military strength of the United <highlight>States</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他加强了美国的军事力量。

examination_example.sentence: It ruined the <highlight>state</highlight>'s cotton and beef industries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它摧毁了该州的棉花和牛肉工业。

examination_example.sentence: It totally destroyed the <highlight>state</highlight>'s rural landscape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它完全摧毁了该州的乡村景观。

examination_example.sentence: It was completed in the <highlight>state</highlight> of New Mexico.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是在新墨西哥州完成的。

examination_example.sentence: But criticism over the original <highlight>state</highlight> of the building is likely to intensify over coming days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对该建筑原始状态的批评可能会在未来几天加剧。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>stated</highlight> she had heard rumors of stock burning but not specific cases until this week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说，她听到过烧毁库存的传言，但直到本周才知道具体的案例。

examination_example.sentence: It takes awareness, effort and courage to go beyond merely <highlight>stating</highlight> you believe something is a good idea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这需要意识、努力和勇气，而不仅仅是陈述你认为某事是个好主意。

sense_info_list.en: provided or controlled by the government of a country
sense_info_list.zh: 国家提供的; 国家控制的

examination_example.sentence: But in the <highlight>state</highlight> sector the excessive focus on English, maths and science threatens to crush arts subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在国有部门，对英语、数学和科学的过度关注威胁着文科的发展。

examination_example.sentence: This discrepancy between <highlight>state</highlight> and private education is a matter of social justice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公立教育和私立教育之间的这种差异事关社会公正。

examination_example.sentence: China's National Bureau of Statistics, China's <highlight>State</highlight> Council Leading Group Office of Poverty Alleviation and Development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国国家统计局、国务院扶贫开发领导小组办公室。

sense_info_list.en: fix or announce the details of something, especially on a written document

examination_example.sentence: Germany has just <highlight>stated</highlight> that they plan to ban the sale of vehicles using gasoline and diesel as fuel by 2030.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德国刚刚宣布，他们计划到2030年禁止销售以汽油和柴油为燃料的汽车。

word_usage.usage: state作名词的基本意思是“状态，状况”，是可数名词，常用于in a state of...，表“处于某种状况、情况”。如：她身体状况很糟糕。She is in a poor state of health.
state作“国家”解时，如强调其政治实体性时，首字母常大写；如不强调政治实体性时，则首字母可小写。

the United States of America，是美国正式通用的名称，简写the States，注意这个专有名词做单数名词。
美利坚合众国位于北美洲。
误 The United States are located in North America.
正 The United States is located in North America.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 州与州之间的；州际的；他州的；别的州的
n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.en: an organized political community forming part of a country; a country considered as an organized political community controlled by one government

examination_example.sentence: Whether not to move to the <highlight>state</highlight>'s mainland.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是否要搬到本州的大陆。

examination_example.sentence: "There hasn't been much progress, " says Nicholas Hartlep, an assistant professor at Metropolitan <highlight>State</highlight> University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “没有太大的进展，”大都会州立大学助理教授尼古拉斯·哈特里普说。

examination_example.sentence: The findings of the latest research were similar to an earlier multi-<highlight>state</highlight> study of assisted living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项最新研究的结果与早先的一项关于辅助生活的多状态研究相似。

examination_example.sentence: The Multidimensional <highlight>State</highlight> Boredom Scale, measures a person's feelings of boredom in a given situation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多维状态无聊量表，衡量一个人在特定情况下的无聊感。

examination_example.sentence: It's the most comfortable <highlight>state</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是最舒适的状态。

examination_example.sentence: It meant finding a <highlight>state</highlight> of calm, peace and mental ease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着找到一种平静、安宁和精神放松的状态。

examination_example.sentence: It has to wait for the <highlight>state</highlight>'s final approval.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它必须等待州政府的最终批准。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>States</highlight> fail when national governments can no longer provide personal security, food security and basic social services.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当国家政府不能再保障个人安全、粮食安全和基本社会服务时，国家就会失败。

word_usage.usage: state作“国家”解时，如强调其政治实体性时，首字母常大写；如不强调政治实体性时，则首字母可小写。
state作名词的基本意思是“状态，状况”，是可数名词，常用于in a state of...，表“处于某种状况、情况”。如：她身体状况很糟糕。She is in a poor state of health.

the United States of America，是美国正式通用的名称，简写the States，注意这个专有名词做单数名词。
美利坚合众国位于北美洲。
误 The United States are located in North America.
正 The United States is located in North America.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

sense_info_list.en: an organized political community forming part of a country; a country considered as an organized political community controlled by one government

examination_example.sentence: At the age of 18, he moved to the United <highlight>States</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 18岁时，他搬到了美国。

examination_example.sentence: forcing patients into a <highlight>state</highlight> of deep sleep
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强制患者进入深度睡眠的状态

examination_example.sentence: putting patients into an unconscious <highlight>state</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让患者进入无意识的状态

examination_example.sentence: We will have a report on the present <highlight>state</highlight> of play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将针对目前进展做一次报告。

examination_example.sentence: We have used data supplied by the World Atlas list so far, which ranks them by their <highlight>stated</highlight> permanent capacity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前为止我们已经使用了世界地图集列表提供的数据，该列表根据其所声明的永久容量对它们进行排名。

examination_example.sentence: Let's <highlight>state</highlight> clearly: Einstein was a genius.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们明确地说：爱因斯坦是个天才。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 陈述；声明；报表；报道；账单；结算单；官方声明；供述；呈现
adj. 定期的；规定的；一定的；阐明的

word_family.mean: n. 状态；状况；情况；国家；政府；领土；州；邦；盛观；隆重的礼仪；印记；压印；印图

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 最新发展水平；最新型的

sense_info_list.en: an organized political community forming part of a country; a country considered as an organized political community controlled by one government

examination_example.sentence: He spent 13 years travelling around the other <highlight>states</highlight>, spreading his ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他花了13年的时间周游列国，传播自己的思想。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>state</highlight> of Qin (秦国 ), there was a man called Shang Yang (商鞅).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在秦国，有一个人叫商鞅。

examination_example.sentence: One is the <highlight>state</highlight> school where parents do not pay money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个是公立学校，家长不用交钱。

examination_example.sentence: At 7 am, we got on the <highlight>state</highlight>-of-the-art Fuxing Hao train at Shanghai Railway Station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早上7点，我们在上海火车站登上了最先进的复兴号列车。

examination_example.sentence: At the summit, Susan said that the <highlight>state</highlight> of the environment worried her a lot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在峰会上，苏珊说环境状况让她非常担心。

examination_example.sentence: Afraid that in her unclear <highlight>state</highlight> of mind she might fall off the rock to her death.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 害怕在她不清楚的精神状态下，她会从岩石上掉下来摔死。

examination_example.sentence: I sent them a letter to <highlight>state</highlight> that I gave up, and in bitterness of spirit I signed it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我给他们寄了一封信，表明我放弃了，我怀着痛苦的心情在信上签了字。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Stating</highlight> your name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说出你自己的名字。

examination_example.sentence: When you meet someone for the first time, by the time you have <highlight>stated</highlight> you name or shaken hands, the other person has already formed an opinion about the kind of person you are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你第一次见到某人时，当你说出你的名字或握手时，对方已经对你是什么样的人形成了看法。

word_usage.usage: state作名词的基本意思是“状态，状况”，是可数名词，常用于in a state of...，表“处于某种状况、情况”。如：她身体状况很糟糕。She is in a poor state of health.
state作“国家”解时，如强调其政治实体性时，首字母常大写；如不强调政治实体性时，则首字母可小写。

the United States of America，是美国正式通用的名称，简写the States，注意这个专有名词做单数名词。
美利坚合众国位于北美洲。
误 The United States are located in North America.
正 The United States is located in North America.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指人的健康状况或事物所处的状态，复数形式可指影响某事发生的一切因素。
普通用词，指人或物在环境、外表、心灵以及健康方面的状况，或指在某一阶段的状态或形式。
指明确具体的环境情况或处境。
正式用词，指政治概念上的国家，即由政府所代表的国家。
普通用词，侧重国土与人民。
常用于文学中，侧重国土，带感情色彩。
最普通用词，指用语言表达思想，着重所说的具体内容。
侧重于说话的动作本身，着重说话的能力而非内容。可指长篇演讲，也可指三言两语的交谈，或指简单的开口发声说话。
较正式用词，通常指用明确的语言或文字着重地叙述事实，既强调内容又注重语气。
普通用词，多指与人交谈时的连续说话，也可指单方面的较长谈话，和speak一样，着重说活的动作而不侧重内容。
普通用词，指将某事向某人讲述或转述，有时含嘱托、命令之意，口语或书面语均可用。
